desc: Laser weapons fire focused beams of light at targets, causing damage through the generation of intense heat.
name: Red Lasers

desc: More powerful than red lasers, these blue variants emit electromagnetic radiation at a wavelength that appears blue or violet to most organics.
name: Blue Lasers

desc: Ultraviolet lasers are an updated and more powerful version of their blue predecessors. Accurate and destructive, these weapons are capable of inflicting great damage.
name: UV Lasers

desc: These lasers have a shorter wavelength than UV-based laser weaponry, but are even more destructive.
name: X-Ray Lasers

desc: The electromagnetic radiation emitted by gamma lasers is of an extremely high frequency. Their destructive potential is unmatched in the field of laser weapons.
name: Gamma Lasers

desc: These heavy energy weapons fire focused particle beams that cause massive damage. The size of the emitter arrays limits their use to large turret mounts.
name: Particle Lances

desc: A more powerful version of the particle lance, this weapon fires a tachyon beam of immense power. Like its predecessor, its use is limited to large turrets.
name: Tachyon Lances

desc: Weapons that eject destructive balls of high-energy plasma at targets. These plasma projectiles are extremely effective at eating through ship armor.
name: Plasma Throwers

desc: These new accelerators launch projectiles of high-energy plasma with improved containment fields. This results in less energy leakage as the projectile travels in space towards its target.
name: Plasma Accelerators

desc: The latest in plasma weaponry, these cannons are fully militarized versions of the older, somewhat improvised plasma throwers. Their plasma projectiles are even deadlier.
name: Plasma Cannons

desc: Powerful weapons that launch a lightning arc of chaotic energy at targets, which in part can ignore armor and shields.
name: Arc Emitters

desc: These upgraded emitters are equipped with better focusing lenses, resulting in a more powerful energy discharge.
name: Focused Arc Emitters

desc: Disruptors fire high-energy bolts that weaken and destroy the molecular bonds that hold the target's constituent atoms together. They are particularly effective against shields.
name: Disruptors

desc: These upgraded disruptors fire bolts of more destructive ion particles at targets.
name: Ion Disruptors

desc: Extremely high-yield disruptors that fire quantum energy charges causing incredible damage to those unfortunate enough to get in their way.
name: Phase Disruptors

desc: These energy torpedoes consist of tightly concentrated protons, and they are capable of completely penetrating deflector screens or shield systems.
name: Proton Torpedoes

desc: Upgraded energy torpedoes that rely on neutrons instead of protons for their destructive power. Like their predecessors, they cannot be stopped by energy shields.
name: Neutron Torpedoes

desc: The best defense is a good offense.
name: Active Countermeasures

desc: Arrays of defensive armaments prove much more effective than independent countermeasures.
name: Interlinked Support Systems

desc: Advanced prediction greatly increases the accuracy of active countermeasure systems.
name: Predictive Algorithms

desc: Applying 5th-dimensional energy manipulation principles on lower dimensional planes allows for the creation of powerful energy weapons.
name: Extradimensional Weaponry

desc: Using strong-focus lenses in combination with an oscillating firing frequence help create lasers strong enough to mine asteroids, or shoot down hostiles.
name: Mining Drone Lasers

desc: Void Clouds use the electrical charges generated by the dense gases that make up most of their core to release bolts of burning plasma. Using the same gas composition together with a specialized conduit allows for powerful lightning weaponry.
name: Cloud Lightning Conduits

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the sapphire type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Blue Crystal Capacitors

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the emerald type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Green Crystal Capacitors

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the topaz type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Yellow Crystal Capacitors

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the ruby type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Red Crystal Capacitors

desc: Transgenic crops offer the nutritional elements of several standard food crops in one convenient package.
name: Transgenic Crops

desc: Improved FTL communication channels allow for more coherent administrative direction.
name: Communication Protocols

desc: Restructuring the managerial web linking core worlds to the capital can help alleviate the administrative stressors and information chokepoints that frequently arise within a budding empire.
name: Administrative Efficiency

desc: The concept of managing individuals as resources within larger systems of production must, by necessity, become more flexible as the potential natures of the managed individuals grow ever more numerous.
name: Sentient Resource Management

desc: Propaganda programs and subtle manipulation of economic records drive down the cost of employing top-tier Leaders.
name: Talent Acquisition

desc: More aggressive information campaigns improve the populace's receptiveness to Edicts.
name: Proclamation Broadcasts

desc: Iterating on the standard conditioning regimen for ground troops has proven to make them more effective in direct combat.
name: Aggressive Conditioning

desc: Careful tuning of pain receptors allow soldiers to fight through what would previously have been debilitating injuries.
name: Nerve Dampeners

desc: Regimens of periodic cell revitalization treatments keep the leader class spry and active beyond traditionally expected lifespans.
name: Cell Revitalization

desc: Unencoded broadcasts signaling our claims on nearby systems are a basic but effective foreign policy tool.
name: Propaganda Transmissions

desc: Chemically optimizing diets for indentured workers allow them to perform above projected productivity curves.
name: Stimulant Diet

desc: The spaceport is a planet's foothold in space, a center for trade and commerce as well as home base for military and civilian vessels.
name: Spaceport

desc: Enhancements to artificial gravity and life support systems allow for further expansion of orbital facilities.
name: Improved Spaceport

desc: State-of-the-art orbital construction techniques result in spaceports the size of major planet side cities.
name: Advanced Spaceport

desc: These massive installations are like cities floating in space. They can support a crew of thousands, and are often equipped with firepower rivaling that of a fleet.
name: Spaceport IV

desc: Establishing new standards for the modeling and construction of cruisers greatly improves the efficiency of the production pipeline.
name: Standardized Cruiser Patterns

desc: Establishing new standards for how we design and construct massive battleships greatly improves the speed at which they can be assembled.
name: Standardized Battleship Patterns

desc: These manned, short-range strike craft are launched from a mothership and rely on their speed and small size to survive long enough to punch through enemy defenses.
name: Carrier Operations

desc: The next generation of strike craft, featuring improved avionics, better handling characteristics and more powerful armament.
name: Improved Strike Craft

desc: A further refinement in strike craft design, these advanced fighters and bombers are a pilot's dream. Their performance far exceeds that of previous models.
name: Advanced Strike Craft

desc: Reinforced nanocomposite hull plating can provide an extra layer of protection that could be the difference between life and death in a combat situation.
name: Nanocomposite Materials

desc: A combination of different metals and ceramics that result in a strong armor without sacrificing flexibility.
name: Ceramo-Metal Materials

desc: Plasteel is an elastic material that combines many of the qualities of plastics and metal. It is relatively cheap to produce and can be used to augment ship armor.
name: Plasteel Materials

desc: This strong yet flexible material is capable of withstanding severe punishment. It serves well as ship armor.
name: Durasteel Materials

desc: This incredibly dense and strong material can resist firepower that would turn armor made of any other alloys into slag.
name: Neutronium Materials

desc: By infusing armor plating with Crystalline matter we are able to further increase the durability of our ships' protective hulls.
name: Crystal-Infused Plating

desc: Introducing Crystalline matter into the forging process further improves the ultra-hard qualities of crystal-infused metals.
name: Crystal-Forged Plating

desc: These electric thrusters use beams of ions to generate thrust without the need for propellant.
name: Ion Thrusters

desc: An advanced form of electric propulsion, plasma thrusters afford ships greater sublight speeds and maneuverability.
name: Plasma Thrusters

desc: These highly advanced fusion-powered thrusters provide ships with unmatched maneuverability and speed under sublight conditions.
name: Impulse Thrusters

desc: This will enable the construction of defensive deep space platforms far from the gravity wells of a planetary body.
name: Deep Space Outposts

desc: New construction methods will allow for the construction of even larger military stations in the depths of space.
name: Deep Space Stations

desc: These massive installations are like cities floating in space. They can support a crew of thousands, and are often equipped with firepower rivaling that of a fleet.
name: Deep Space Installations

desc: The creation of a dedicated naval engineering corps will greatly benefit the construction of deep space defense platforms, decreasing building costs and increasing durability.
name: Corps of Engineers

desc: The basic industrial infrastructure that is required to become a spacefaring civilization.
name: Industrial Base

desc: Wearing a powered exoskeleton suit augments the user's strength and speed. The military applications are obvious, but it will also increase labor efficiency.
name: Powered Exoskeletons

desc: New fracking techniques will allow us to tap into previously unattainable pockets of geothermal resources deep beneath the planet's crust.
name: Geothermal Fracking

desc: These massive drills are needed to access the rich mineral deposits that can often be found close to a planet's core.
name: Deep Core Mining

desc: Advanced spectrometry combines with fracking techniques and chemical flushing to rapidly exploit shallow and mid-depth deposits.
name: Mineral Isolation

desc: Optimal processing of mined materials have allowed us to reach new levels of efficiency.
name: Mineral Processing

desc: Second-stage processing of pseudo-refined minerals allow for more efficient storage and transportation.
name: Advanced Mineral Processing

desc: Advanced instrumentation allows for the study and practical application of physical systems at nanometric scales.
name: Nanomechanics

desc: The production and understanding of supersolids are of immeasurable value to any and every space-age civilization.
name: Supersolid Materials

desc: The study of superfluidity promises to marry quantum mechanics with the fundamental interaction of gravity.
name: Superfluid Materials

desc: These robotic work units are perfect for menial labor tasks. They are hard-working and capable of following simple vocal instructions, but should not be expected to climb stairs.
name: Robotic Workers

desc: Upgraded robotic workers, these units have an expanded movement range equal to that of most organics. Their neural processors have also been greatly improved.
name: Droids

desc: Highly advanced robots that are stronger, faster and more durable than the vast majority of organics. With their upgraded neural processors they are fully capable of independent operations.
name: Synthetics

desc: Equipped with a personality, synthetics will finally be able to interact socially on equal terms with the rest of our citizens. Some units may even assume leadership roles.
name: Synthetic Personality Matrix

desc: These powerful thrusters provide additional combat speed but consume a great deal of power.
name: Afterburners

desc: This improved version of the standard afterburners provide an even greater boost to a ship's combat speed.
name: Advanced Afterburners

desc: These electromagnetic projectile launchers use magnets to accelerate armor-piercing rounds towards targets at high speeds.
name: Mass Drivers

desc: Coilguns are more powerful versions of the early mass drivers, using electromagnetic coils to rapidly accelerate projectiles towards targets.
name: Coilguns

desc: The latest in electromagnetic accelerators, railguns use twin parallel rails to fire projectiles at incredible speeds.
name: Railguns

desc: A new version of the venerable railgun, with sturdier rails and an enhanced power supply. These weapons are even more powerful and accurate than their predecessors.
name: Advanced Railguns

desc: This updated version of the old coilgun design is even more destructive than the latest railgun designs. It is capable of launching projectiles with incredible accuracy and speed.
name: Gauss Cannons

desc: Very long-range artillery capable of hurling powerful rounds over extreme distances with a large degree of accuracy.
name: Kinetic Battery

desc: An even more powerful long-range, ship-based artillery cannon, equipped with a new barrel and an upgraded fire control computer.
name: Kinetic Artillery

desc: An enormous mass accelerator cannon that can only be placed in a spinal mount and fires monstrously powerful rounds over vast distances.
name: Mega Cannon

desc: An even more powerful mass accelerator cannon that can rip through even the toughest shields.
name: Giga Cannon

desc: Large-caliber ballistic weapons that fire cased explosive shells. The main advantage of these cannons is their high rate of fire.
name: Autocannons

desc: These upgraded rotary autocannons feature improved tracking and fire control systems. This allows them to maintain an even higher rate of fire.
name: Ripper Cannons

desc: Advanced rotary autocannons capable of spewing a cloud of armor-piercing and high-explosive shells at a target.
name: Stormfire Cannons

desc: Gun batteries that fire area effect shrapnel rounds at close range. They are particularly lethal to enemy strike craft, but can also inflict damage on larger ships.
name: Flak Battery

desc: Upgraded flak batteries with new, more powerful shrapnel rounds. They offer excellent defense against both strike craft and missiles.
name: Flak Artillery

desc: Space-to-space missiles equipped with high-yield nuclear warheads. Although based on old pre-space technology, these crude fire-and-forget weapons can be surprisingly effective at range.
name: Nuclear Missiles

desc: These updated space-to-space missiles have more powerful fusion warheads and improved flight performance.
name: Fusion Missiles

desc: Advanced missiles equipped with very powerful antimatter warheads. A new and improved guidance system gives them a better chance of finding their targets.
name: Antimatter Missiles

desc: The latest version of space-to-space missile, this upgraded variant has an immensely powerful warhead that draws its energy from a zero point vacuum.
name: Quantum Missiles

desc: These highly advanced missiles are equipped with limited onboard AI pilots that substantially improve their performance and ability to track targets.
name: Marauder Missiles

desc: These smaller missiles are launched in volleys and have been specifically designed to overwhelm enemy point-defense systems.
name: Swarmer Missiles

desc: New miniaturization techniques will allow us to equip swarmer missiles with more powerful warheads and improved flight performance.
name: Whirlwind Missiles

desc: These torpedoes are essentially very large, slow-moving missiles. They are equipped with more powerful warheads and shield modulators that let them slip unmolested through energy screens.
name: Space Torpedoes

desc: Upgraded space torpedoes encased in armor, to better withstand enemy point-defense fire. The armor fragments into shards that cause additional damage when the torpedo detonates.
name: Armored Torpedoes

desc: Advanced torpedoes with very powerful warheads. They have a sleeker design, faster engines and upgraded shield modulators for slipping through energy screens.
name: Devastator Torpedoes

desc: By breeding Space Amoebas in captivity, we can program their symbiotic flagella to act as organic strike craft for our navy.
name: Amoeba Breeding Program

desc: Collecting specimens from defeated Prethoryn enables us to clone and genetically program a war-brood of our own.
name: Swarm Spawning Pools

desc: By analyzing the biological weaponry employed by the Swarm we can create self-propelled projectiles weapons spreading the very same horrific destruction.
name: Scourge Missiles

desc: Adapting the Tiyanki method of siphoning energy from gaseous matter, it is possible to construct weapons draining energy from enemy ships.
name: Frequency Tuning

desc: High-capacity quantum bands dedicated to databank transfers make possible virtually completely synchronous research operations across vast distances.
name: Databank Uplinks

desc: Miniaturization of the endpoint transmitters allow for installing them in clusters, further increasing bandwidth.
name: Uplink Miniaturization

desc: The scientific method is a body of techniques for investigating phenomena, acquiring new knowledge, or correcting and integrating previous knowledge.
name: Scientific Method

desc: These shipboard lab facilities incorporates advanced technologies from the ancient Curator Order to further increase survey speeds.
name: Curator Exploration Lab

desc: A shipboard lab with advanced archaeological equipment, including a vast database supplied by the Curator Order where new discoveries can easily be cross-referenced.
name: Curator Archeology Lab

desc: Exploring the mediation of fundamental forces through subatomic particles.
name: Quantum Theory

desc: The seemingly erratic behavior of tiny things can dramatically alter the way we think about bigger things.
name: Applied Quantum Physics

desc: Three dimensions, inextricable from the fourth.
name: Space-Time Theory

desc: A bid for globalized resource pools and more flexible research grants.
name: Global Research Initiative

desc: By giving control of the colony ship to an Artificial Intelligence, the crew and colonists can be suspended in a deep sleep.
name: AI-Controlled Colony Ships

desc: Sufficiently advanced systems are capable of optimizing themselves if they are made acutely aware of the purpose for which they were made.
name: Self-Aware Colony Ships

desc: Order the Science ship to automatically explore the galaxy
name: Automatic Exploration

desc: Evolving intellects advance science not only as subjects of study, but as researchers themselves.
name: Sentient AI

desc: Active matrices tuned for specific combat-centric tasks greatly improve engagement efficiency.
name: Specialized Combat Computers

desc: Further advances in predictive algorithms allow for augmented tactical decision-making in the field.
name: Extended Combat Algorithms

desc: Running sentient AIs through high-intensity combat simulations yields valuable insight into potential optimizations for risk-evaluation techniques.
name: Sentient Combat Simulations

desc: Aligning defensive and offensive weapon execution paradigms allows for increased efficiency.
name: Synchronized Defenses

desc: This energy source generates power through induced fission, but it also produces harmful nuclear waste.
name: Fission Power

desc: Nuclear fusion processes generate a great amount of power, but without many of the risks associated with fission power.
name: Fusion Power

desc: The ability to sustain a fusion reaction at relatively low temperatures will result in a new generation of fusion reactors.
name: Cold Fusion Power

desc: By harnessing the energy produced by matter/antimatter annihilations, our efficiency at generating power will be orders of magnitude better than fusion.
name: Antimatter Power

desc: These generators extract vacuum energy, providing an almost limitless supply of power. There is no more efficient way to generate energy.
name: Zero Point Power

desc: Energy deflector screens can stop a limited amount of incoming enemy fire before overloading. Their main drawback is that they consume large amounts of power.
name: Deflectors

desc: These updated deflector screens are capable of soaking up even more punishment before they overload.
name: Improved Deflectors

desc: These new shield generators represent the next generation of energy screens, replacing the older deflector technology. They offer significantly better protection.
name: Shields

desc: An updated shield generator that produces an even stronger energy field. Only sustained enemy fire can penetrate this barrier.
name: Advanced Shields

desc: These reinforced and hardened energy shields are incredibly powerful. The protection they offer is second to none.
name: Hyper Shields

desc: These capacitors store surplus energy which can quickly be transferred in the event of shield failure. This will greatly increase the rate at which shields recharge.
name: Shield Capacitors

desc: Localized fields of charged particles can energize depleted shield capacitors.
name: Capacitor Fields

desc: Generating a strong energy shield within a planetary atmosphere is a greater challenge than in the vacuum of space, but it offers a potent defense against orbital bombardment.
name: Planetary Shields

desc: These sensors have been tuned to look for any gravitational changes in space, such as those produced by the presence of a starship.
name: Gravitic Sensors

desc: Sensors that detect the subspace fluctuations left in the wake of traveling starships. Their sensitivity and range is greater than that of a gravitic sensor array.
name: Subspace Sensors

desc: Advanced sensors that rely on rotating tachyon beams to detect ship movements even at extreme distances.
name: Tachyon Sensors

desc: Powerful sensor arrays that can be added to the structure of orbital spaceports. They provide excellent sensor coverage of the surrounding region of space.
name: Orbital Sensor Arrays

desc: Capacitors capable of storing vast amounts of energy is one of the cornerstones for any modern civilization.
name: High-Energy Capacitors

desc: Modulated fields allow for increased production and improved energy yield.
name: Field Modulation

desc: Basic entanglement principles applied to energy generation provide a substantial increase in energy output.
name: Quantum Energy States

desc: Quantum superposition of energy coils, simultaneously drained and charged.
name: Quantum Field Manipulation

desc: Advances in solar panel technology could potentially reduce the operating costs of our spaceports. The panels would require an entire spaceport module to generate enough energy, however.
name: Orbital Energy Conversion

desc: Load-balancing facilities can greatly improve the stability of local grids and feed excess power back into centralized capacitors.
name: Global Energy Management

desc: A re-engineered and unified grid further reduces energy losses over distance.
name: Planetary Power Grid

desc: By tunneling directly through subspace, a temporary conduit can be established between two different points in normal space. Travel between these points would be near instantaneous.
name: Subspace Wormholes

desc: The creation of a stable wormhole takes time and requires massive amounts of energy, but the process can be streamlined with the use of special calibrators.
name: Wormhole Calibration Matrix

desc: These containment fields allow for the creation of more powerful wormholes without the risk of triggering a sudden subspace energy cascade.
name: Wormhole Containment Fields

desc: Like the strands of a spider web, the extra-dimensional realm of hyperspace runs between the gravity wells of most stars. Faster than light travel is theoretically possible along these hyperlanes.
name: Hyperspace Travel

desc: We have identified the existence of points in space where a ship expends less energy to "breach" their way into a hyperlane. This will lead to a new generation of hyper drives.
name: Hyperlane Breach Points

desc: A new generation of hyper drives capable of accessing the subspace slipstreams that are present within hyperspace. This leads to dramatically improved drive performance.
name: Hyperspace Slipstreams

desc: Although we do not travel through hyperspace, mapping the galaxy's extensive hyperlane network gives us a clear advantage against those who do.
name: Hyperlane Mapping

desc: By enveloping a vessel in a warp field and forming a subspace bubble around it, velocities exceeding the speed of light are theoretically possible.
name: Warp Travel

desc: Improved stabilization techniques for warp fields will enable our ships to travel farther while expending less energy.
name: Warp Field Stabilizers

desc: These revolutionary ramscoops are attached to warp drives and function as particle collectors, replenishing a starship's fuel supply.
name: Warp Drive Ramscoops

desc: A groundbreaking technological marvel, the Jump Drive shreds the local space-time continuum and rearranges it on the quantum level to be identical to that of the target destination - and thus the ship appears to near-instantly "jump" from system to system.
name: Jump Drive

desc: Quantum Destabilizers agitate the local quantum field, disturbing sensitive targeting equipment aboard hostile ships.
name: Quantum Destabilizer

desc: The Ether Drake's scales are made up of multiple layers of unique mineral nanostructures. Unorthodox manufacturing techniques allow us to closely emulate these self-repairing structures.
name: Artificial Dragonscales

desc: These deflectors operate in ways that seem to defy the laws of nature. Somehow they can manage to muster a protective field many times greater than what could seem possible.
name: Enigmatic Deflectors

desc: These generators cause particles to interact with each other in ways that seem to defy nature. Somehow they can put out more power than what would seem possibe.
name: Enigmatic Power Generation

desc: The Enigmatic Encoder scrambles flight path data according to some indeterminable design before feeding it back to fleet command.
name: Enigmatic Encoder

desc: While producing average results in standard tests, the accuracy of Enigmatic Decoder's prediction algorithms seemingly increases as the target's flight path grows more erratic.
name: Enigmatic Decoder

desc: By flooding a localized area with weak, randomly-modulated electromagnetic pulses, enemy shield and weapons systems can be partially disrupted.
name: Enigmatic Disruption Field

desc: Changes in how mineral deposits are evaluated relative to each other lead to more efficient boring patterns.
name: Extraction Patterns

desc: Cross-linking weapon systems to fire in staggered volleys improves the actual damage output of Military Stations over time.
name: Synchronized Firing Patterns

desc: Additional layers of armor plating within the structure itself improves the resilience of Military Stations.
name: Fortified Core Layers

desc: Further increasing compartmentalization of shipboard spaces allows ships to sustain more damage before hull integrity reaches critically low levels.
name: Hull Integrity

desc: Compressing suitable materials into ultra-dense forms is a cheap and efficient way to improve their ability to absorb weapons-grade impacts.
name: Matter Compression

desc: With the chemical reaction tightly controlled by missile-board microprocessors, warhead detonations can be tuned for maximum effect for local conditions at the time of impact.
name: Thermodynamic Yield Control

desc: Advances in miniaturization allow for more rapid loading and discharging of rocket-propelled payloads.
name: Miniaturized Pre-Igniters

desc: Ultra-dense slugs can punch through even the strongest of projected shields.
name: High-Density Munitions

desc: Minor technical advances combine with improved shipboard routines for handling munitions to provide a noticeable boost in fire rate.
name: Loader Efficiency

desc: Increasing the speed at which fighter pilots can process and act upon enemy positioning data elevates strike craft a few steps up the food chain.
name: Synapse Interceptors

desc: Circulating excess heat from weapons discharge in order to prime munitions as they are loaded increases the rate of fire of strike craft weaponry.
name: Heat Recyclers

desc: The challenges inherent in cultivating crops in zero-G are fairly unique, but far from insurmountable.
name: Orbital Hydroponics

desc: Hydroponics techniques can be further developed by creating farms with unique atmospheres, simulating different eco systems. This allows for the production of food with higher levels of nutrients.
name: Eco Simulation

desc: Sophisticated genetic engineering of crops helps increase yield and further improves both taste and nutrient levels.
name: Gene Crops

desc: Infusing crop strands with small amounts of nano-machines help create a type of produce that is ultra resilient, and the chemical composition of which can be tailored and altered during its entire lifetime.
name: Nano-Vitality Crops

desc: The process of synthetically replicating crops requires a lot of collected waste to create a small amount of produce, but nevertheless provides a significant boost to agricultural output.
name: Nutrient Replication

desc: Studying the different forms of life that appear on our world helps us better understand ourselves and the life that surrounds us.
name: Biodiversity Studies

desc: Studying the life that arises on other worlds and beyond allows us to understand fundamental aspects of biology that were previously beyond our reach.
name: Xenobiology

desc: Having the opportunity to study the multitudes of life lets us find some common ground for all living beings. The foundational building blocks of life.
name: Secrets of Life

desc: Studying the fauna of other worlds gives insight into alien behaviors, allowing us to identify and domesticate docile entities.
name: Xenology

desc: Calculating required resources and gear required to establish a planetary colony allows us to herd brave pioneers into grand "colony ships", confident that they will survive the long voyage across the stars to their new home.
name: New World Horizons

desc: By adjusting atmospheric filtering on a per-site basis to better filter out undesirable elements, colonial living conditions may be improved.
name: Atmospheric Filtering

desc: Further study into the hazardous environments found on other planets help alleviate the difficulties that colonizers encounter in their day-to-day lives on foreign worlds.
name: Hostile Environment Adaption

desc: Extensive study into different soil types and their ability to support crops will help improve the living conditions of our settlers on foreign worlds.
name: Foreign Soil Enrichment

desc: Additonal study into different planetary climates will allow us to settle our population on worlds previously thought too hostile to support them.
name: Hostile Climate Adaption

desc: Through comprehensive study of irradiated environments we will allow our settlers to colonize worlds that have been devastated by nuclear warfare.
name: Tomb World Adaption

desc: The colonization of alien worlds has opened up an entirely new field of biomedical research.
name: Frontier Health

desc: As a colony grows, so does its medical needs. Larger colonies are potentially exposed to more dangerous pathogens on alien worlds.
name: Frontier Hospital

desc: History has proven collectives to be the most efficient social structure for settler enclaves.
name: Frontier Collectives

desc: Studies indicate that strict social control may be integral to the continued resilience of young colonies.
name: Frontier Commissars

desc: Managing connections between the private sector and the government, giving subsidies to the right investors, allows for private initiatives into colonization.
name: Frontier Initiatives

desc: A certain pioneering spirit manifests itself in the priorities of orbital construction.
name: Frontier Traditions

desc: There is no simple solution to the problem of macro-scale reshaping of planetary crusts - only bigger trowels and orbitally-deployed drills.
name: Terrestrial Sculpting

desc: Humidity regulators and chemical dispersal units are the first step towards a fundamentally altered atmosphere.
name: Atmospheric Manipulation

desc: By advancing our understanding of atmopsheric manipulation, we will be able to terraform even the most ecologically devastated worlds.
name: Climate Restoration

desc: The creation of Gaia planets, worlds eminently suitable to almost all forms of life, is the ultimate proof of a species' mastery in the art of terraforming.
name: Gaia Creation

desc: Mapping the genome of an individual through the sequencing of their DNA opens up for tailored medical treatments and therapies.
name: Genome Mapping

desc: Advanced DNA methylation techniques allow for functionally significant alterations to be made to arbitrary genomes.
name: Epigenetic triggers

desc: Breakthroughs in enucleation and artificial womb technology allows for the mass-production of individuals based on a common genetic template.
name: Cloning

desc: Gene Banks filter and curate available genomes for deployment in clones.
name: Gene Banks

desc: Nucleotide purification techniques allow for the isolation and refinement of particularly desirable genetic traits.
name: Gene Seed Purification

desc: From its cradle as a purely pharmaceutical venture, advancements in our understanding of the morphogenetic field allow for direct, subconscious interfaces with organic units.
name: Morphogenetic Field Mastery

desc: Stricter control of RNA and protein production on the cellular level.
name: Targeted Gene Expressions

desc: Careful reproductive planning should be incentivized, lest we waste valuable genetic legacies.
name: Selected Lineages

desc: We leave nothing to chance, no matter the cost. Through exacting curation of DNA banks do we build the leaders of tomorrow.
name: Capacity Boosters

desc: A genetically altered version of silicon-based bacteria could potentially be manipulated to regenerate non-organic materials.
name: Regenerative Hull Tissue

desc: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
name: Doctrine: Space Combat

desc: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
name: Doctrine: Reactive Formations

desc: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
name: Doctrine: Interstellar Warfare

desc: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
name: Doctrine: Fluid Fleet Templates

desc: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
name: Doctrine: Armada Battle Formation

desc: A body of knowledge regarding combat behaviors is useless without a strong code governing its use.
name: Interstellar Fleet Traditions

desc: As extrasolar expeditions become more common, it is important to provide planetside relief for returning fleets.
name: Doctrine: Fleet Support

desc: Restructuring the chain of command and deciding what interdependencies are set between officers, make fleets more responsive and thus cost-effective.
name: Doctrine: Command Matrix

desc: Standardizing workflows for upgrading and retrofitting ship components can lead to massive efficiency gains.
name: Doctrine: Refit Standards

desc: Creating dedicated headquarters for all levels of military operations shapes an efficient fleet, and lays a better foundation for future military training.
name: Centralized Command

desc: A more extensive training program for new recruits, including realistic combat scenarios, prepare them for the field.
name: Combat Training

desc: The mind is in many ways a reflection of the universe itself, a microcosmos. All species may not reach this insight, but their minds are tools greater than any other.
name: Psionic Theory

desc: Once fully adapted to the basics of Psionics, the mind is capable of connecting to other individuals, becoming something greater.
name: Telepathy

desc: Advances in the field of Psionics suggest the possibility of creating combat computers capable of reading and analysing the impulses of telepathic operatives before they are cognitively processed.
name: Precognition Interface

desc: The Psi Jump Drive harnesses the psi energies emitted by the crew to force the vessel through the very fabric of reality, instantly "jumping" vast distances.
name: Psi Jump Drive

desc: A celebration of purity, perhaps of spirit, or of the body, or purpose - dependent on whatever goal we have in mind.
name: Purity Campaigns

desc: As we explore more of the galaxy and its wonders, it becomes increasingly important for us to reaffirm our beliefs and to unify our people under one symbol.
name: Symbols of Unity

desc: As we learn that we are not alone in space, we should begin preparations to welcome our new-found friends.
name: Alien Visitor Centers

desc: From disparate components do we build a whole greater than the sum of its parts.
name: Xeno Integration

desc: Reduces Cede Planet and Cede Frontier Outpost War Demand Cost.
name: Galactic Ambitions

desc: We must have to courage to seize our fate and make true what was always meant to be.
name: Manifest Destiny

desc: An elysian dome housing examples of natural beauty carefully curated to induce a potent mixture of nostalgia and patriotism.
name: Paradise Dome

desc: The advent of accurate pain emulators will at long last bridge the divide between the virtual and the real.
name: Virtual Combat Simulations

desc: Proper regulation of our industries and processes will lead to better planetary yeilds on all fronts, lest we drown ourselves in our own red tape.
name: Planetary Government

desc: Ancient warring tribes, historical nations in conflict, now unified in empire. We must not, will not, crumble.
name: Planetary Unification

desc: Robust frameworks for local governance created on a per-case basis, to meet each colony's needs.
name: Colonial Centralization

desc: The administrative needs of a star empire are as numerous as they are complex. We will rise to the occasion.
name: Galactic Administration

desc: By engaging in free trade of goods and services we allow for a more specialized economy, where an individual can excel in a narrow field and trade for their needs.
name: Galactic Markets

desc: This massive entertainment complex is where dreams come true. Shopping malls, restaurants, amusement parks, virtual arcades, and more. You dream it - we are it!
name: Hyper-Entertainment Forum

desc: Our people are united and strong, and their rulers benevolent. Sometimes the populace needs to be reminded of this fact.
name: Galactic Benevolence

desc: The progress we make calls for a new, nimbler form of administration that may aid rather than hinder us in our pursuits.
name: Adaptive Bureaucracy

desc: The Empire lives, the Empire breathes. We may make up its body, but it is not for the left hand to know what the right hand is doing.
name: The Living State

desc: Finding aspects of the self within the group is natural and inevitable; eventually those shared aspects must be valued higher than individual identities.
name: The Collective Self

desc: Cognition is little but the processing of sensory input. It can be altered.
name: Neural Implants

desc: It is circumstance that dictate what is moral. Define the circumstances, and ethics is like clay in your hands.
name: Artificial Moral Codes

desc: Thinking outside the box merely places you in another, somewhat larger box.
name: Synthetic Thought Patterns

desc: As power is simply the ability to impose one's will on others, the will to power is a self-fulfilling prophecy.
name: Will to Power

desc: Minor improvements to transmission efficiency adds up to a sizeable reduction in overall energy loss.
name: Applied Superconductivity

desc: The basic mechanics of ship shields are complex, but they can be adjusted and improved in a multitude of ways.
name: Shield Harmonics

desc: Perfecting the firing cadence of laser weaponry is a task that could keep the engineering elite of any given planet busy for centuries.
name: Focusing Arrays

desc: New developments in tech cooling regularly surface, improving the stability and efficiency of our weapons systems, keeping them from blowing up the ships upon which they are mounted.
name: Flash Coolant

desc: As our fleets roam every further from our ancestral home, our sensor technology continuously pushes past the limits of old.
name: Planetary Signal Boosters

desc: Increasingly powerful computation paradigms allow us to adapt individual construction projects to planetary and ultra-local gravitational conditions.
name: Gravitational Analysis

desc: The application of game and puzzle theory has the potential to greatly optimize modular assembly and construction.
name: Assembly Algorithms

desc: Establishing successful Garanthium quarries poses unique challenges, as the malleable qualities of the ore make it as difficult to mine as it is attractive.
name: Garanthium Mining

desc: Small concentrations of this gas has been shown to significantly strengthen the integrity of energy force fields. It also has a dulling effect on the minds of creatures exposed to the gas.
name: Lythuric Gas Refining

desc: A naturally occurring stimulant that helps all forms of life adapt and evolve. It can also be used as a very potent conductor for energy weapons.
name: Engos Vapor Refining

desc: Teldar crystals emanate tell-tale wavelengths of light outside the visible spectrum.
name: Teldar Crystal Mining

desc: This fine dust is a naturally occurring stimulant found on some worlds. It has a calming effect on most beings, and can be used as a non-violent way of pacifying hostile individuals.
name: Pitharan Dust Refining

desc: Stabilization beams allow relatively safe extraction of volatile Orillium ores.
name: Orillium Mining

desc: Neutronium is a super-dense substance composed of neutrons that can be forged into extremely resistant and durable armor.
name: Neutronium Extraction

desc: Mining and processing the rare living metals is exceedingly difficult, but successful application of the mutable alloys yields incomparable advantages.
name: Living Metal

desc: The Betharian minerals appear to have originated from singular source, but were scattered across the galaxy millennia ago. The minerals are most often encountered as pebble-sized clusters, and are highly flammable.
name: Betharian Refining

desc: An extremely rare aerosol of exotic particles. It has been deposited on a number of worlds through meteor impacts, but its true origin is a mystery. If ingested by psionically-gifted individuals, Zro acts as a very potent (and addictive) drug that enhances Psi abilities.
name: Zro Distillation

desc: This gas is a naturally occurring stimulant found on some worlds. It has a calming effect on most beings, and can be used as a non-violent way of pacifying hostile individuals.
name: Satramene Refining

desc: This exotic substance has many properties that seemingly defy the laws of physics. Harvestable concentrations can only be found near Black Holes or in certain nebulas.
name: Dark Matter Drawing

desc: Laser weapons fire focused beams of light at targets, causing damage through the generation of intense heat.
name: Red Lasers

desc: More powerful than red lasers, these blue variants emit electromagnetic radiation at a wavelength that appears blue or violet to most organics.
name: Blue Lasers

desc: Ultraviolet lasers are an updated and more powerful version of their blue predecessors. Accurate and destructive, these weapons are capable of inflicting great damage.
name: UV Lasers

desc: These lasers have a shorter wavelength than UV-based laser weaponry, but are even more destructive.
name: X-Ray Lasers

desc: The electromagnetic radiation emitted by gamma lasers is of an extremely high frequency. Their destructive potential is unmatched in the field of laser weapons.
name: Gamma Lasers

desc: These heavy energy weapons fire focused particle beams that cause massive damage. The size of the emitter arrays limits their use to large turret mounts.
name: Particle Lances

desc: A more powerful version of the particle lance, this weapon fires a tachyon beam of immense power. Like its predecessor, its use is limited to large turrets.
name: Tachyon Lances

desc: Weapons that eject destructive balls of high-energy plasma at targets. These plasma projectiles are extremely effective at eating through ship armor.
name: Plasma Throwers

desc: These new accelerators launch projectiles of high-energy plasma with improved containment fields. This results in less energy leakage as the projectile travels in space towards its target.
name: Plasma Accelerators

desc: The latest in plasma weaponry, these cannons are fully militarized versions of the older, somewhat improvised plasma throwers. Their plasma projectiles are even deadlier.
name: Plasma Cannons

desc: Powerful weapons that launch a lightning arc of chaotic energy at targets, which in part can ignore armor and shields.
name: Arc Emitters

desc: These upgraded emitters are equipped with better focusing lenses, resulting in a more powerful energy discharge.
name: Focused Arc Emitters

desc: Disruptors fire high-energy bolts that weaken and destroy the molecular bonds that hold the target's constituent atoms together. They are particularly effective against shields.
name: Disruptors

desc: These upgraded disruptors fire bolts of more destructive ion particles at targets.
name: Ion Disruptors

desc: Extremely high-yield disruptors that fire quantum energy charges causing incredible damage to those unfortunate enough to get in their way.
name: Phase Disruptors

desc: These energy torpedoes consist of tightly concentrated protons, and they are capable of completely penetrating deflector screens or shield systems.
name: Proton Torpedoes

desc: Upgraded energy torpedoes that rely on neutrons instead of protons for their destructive power. Like their predecessors, they cannot be stopped by energy shields.
name: Neutron Torpedoes

desc: Applying 5th-dimensional energy manipulation principles on lower dimensional planes allows for the creation of powerful energy weapons.
name: Extradimensional Weaponry

desc: Using strong-focus lenses in combination with an oscillating firing frequence help create lasers strong enough to mine asteroids, or shoot down hostiles.
name: Mining Drone Lasers

desc: Void Clouds use the electrical charges generated by the dense gases that make up most of their core to release bolts of burning plasma. Using the same gas composition together with a specialized conduit allows for powerful lightning weaponry.
name: Cloud Lightning Conduits

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the sapphire type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Blue Crystal Capacitors

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the emerald type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Green Crystal Capacitors

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the topaz type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Yellow Crystal Capacitors

desc: Crystalline Entities store stellar raditation within their prismatic bodies and can focus it to emit laser-like beams. Using the ruby type's prismatic pattern as a base we can construct laser capacitors that produce energy at a similar wavelength.
name: Red Crystal Capacitors

desc: The spaceport is a planet's foothold in space, a center for trade and commerce as well as home base for military and civilian vessels.
name: Spaceport

desc: Enhancements to artificial gravity and life support systems allow for further expansion of orbital facilities.
name: Improved Spaceport

desc: State-of-the-art orbital construction techniques result in spaceports the size of major planet side cities.
name: Advanced Spaceport

desc: These massive installations are like cities floating in space. They can support a crew of thousands, and are often equipped with firepower rivaling that of a fleet.
name: Spaceport IV

desc: Construction in space presents our Engineers with new design challenges that must be solved before we can build orbital stations above other worlds.
name: Deep Space Construction

desc: Significantly larger than the patrol frigate, the destroyer is a very cheap and effective frontline ship that is capable of being quickly produced while fielding tons of offensive capabilites for its price. However, a major increase in maintenance costs makes them hard to sustain in peace times.
name: Destroyer Bluepints

desc: A significant advancement in starship design, the cruiser's impressive size is matched by its array of larger scale weapons and additional defensive systems.  While it can take a beating on the battlefield, its reduced maneuverability can leave it vulnerable to swarms of smaller vessels.
name: Cruiser Blueprints

desc: Battlecruisers field the largest torpedo batteries of any known ship design. Their strong salvoes are able to obliterate smaller vessels in an instant, but high maintenance and weak defensive systems limit their ability to serve as the core for a fleet.
name: Battlecruiser blueprints

desc: The battleship is one of the the largest vessels to serve in the navy of any empire. Its enourmous defensive and support capabilities makes it fearsome opponents in combat, while her upgraded fuel storage allows it to reach directly into every distant system.
name: Battleship blueprints

desc: If you get into a fight, strike first, and strike hard!' This advice serves as the inspiration for the design behind the heavy escort. Able to quickly jump to high Warp speeds, ships of this class carry impressive offensive capabilities despite their small size and high maneuverability.
name: Heavy Escort blueprints

desc: The most advanced starship design the Milky Way has seen in a long time, assault cruisers are equipped with powerful forward spinal weapons, capable of obliterating opponents from afar while still fielding enough normal beam and torpedeo weaponry to deal with other ships up close. Its high maintenance and cost make this ship class more of a luxury, however.
name: Assault Cruiser blueprints

desc: Recent developments in starship construction allows for far more robust and modular designs, with simplified production lines and scalable components that can fit a wide range of starships. Research and development centers can now plan for highly specialized ships that are best suited for the task at hand.
name: Advanced Starship design

desc: Multi-Vector Assault Mode uses advanced compartmentalization and automation systems to split itself into three separate warp-capable craft, becoming an entire squadron operating either semi-independently or in concert with its other sections.
name: Multi-Vector Attack Mode

desc: Small stations equipped with long-range sensors will help us keep an eye on neighboring civilizations and help with monitoring any spaceborne traffic in the nearby star systems.
name: Listening Posts

desc: These massive defensive outposts provide extensive protection against enemy incursion, and serve to deter less enthusiastic adversaries from nefarious behavior.
name: Deep Space Installations

desc: Cross-linking weapon systems to fire in staggered volleys improves the actual damage output of Military Stations over time.
name: Synchronized Firing Patterns

desc: Additional layers of armor plating within the structure itself improves the resilience of Military Stations.
name: Fortified Core Layers

desc: The creation of a dedicated naval Engineering corps will greatly benefit the construction of deep space defense platforms, decreasing building costs and increasing durability.
name: Engineering Corps

desc: The basic industrial infrastructure that is required to become a spacefaring civilization.
name: Industrial Base

desc: Advanced instrumentation allows the study and practical application of physical systems at nanometric scales.
name: Nanomechanics

desc: The production and understanding of superfluid are of immeasurable value to any and every space-age civilization.
name: Superfluid Materials

desc: Changes in how mineral deposits are evaluated relative to each other lead to more efficient boring patterns.
name: Extraction Patterns

desc: Optimal processing of mined materials have allowed us to reach new levels of efficiency.
name: Mineral Silo

desc: Second-stage processing of pseudo-refined minerals allow for more efficient storage and transportation.
name: Zero Compression Techniques

desc: Optimal processing of mined materials have allowed us to reach new levels of efficiency.
name: Advanced Mineral Processing

desc: Advanced spectrometry combines fracking techniques and chemical flushing to rapidly exploit shallow and mid-depth lying deposits.
name: Mineral Isolation

desc: These massive drills are needed to access the rich mineral deposits that can often be found close to a planet's core.
name: Deep core mining

desc: Planetary migration is made significantly easier and faster due to the centralization of both shuttlecraft and long-range transporters.
name: Transport Hub

desc: Through the application of an electromagnetic field to the ship's hull, the structural integrity can be significantly increased, protecting the starship from enemy weapons fire.
name: Polarized Hull Plating

desc: The structural integrity field was developed to supplement the natural structural integrity of the material their starship hulls were composed of. Engineers use a structural integrity force field to supplement the supports and bulkheads that give a spacecraft its shape. Improved force field generators make starships much more capable of unduring the harsh elements and forces of interstellar travel.
name: Structural Integrity Field

desc: The structural integrity field was developed to supplement the natural structural integrity of the material their starship hulls were composed of. Engineers use a structural integrity force field to supplement the supports and bulkheads that give a spacecraft its shape. Advanced force field generators and dispurtion arrays make starships even more capable of unduring the extreme elements and forces of interstellar travel.
name: Rotating Structural Integrity Field

desc: Compressing suitable materials into ultra-dense forms is a cheap and efficient way to improve their ability to absorb weapons-grade impacts.
name: Matter Compression

desc: With the concept of "less is more" in mind, we can develop starship hulls that are lighter while remaining strong.  This allows our ships to be more agile, while still receiving suitable protection from the rigors of space travel.
name: Light Hull Construction Specialization

desc: By sacrificing some agility and maneuverability, we can heavily armor our starships in the most dense materials we can find.  Let's see them shoot through that.
name: Heavy Hull Construction Specialization

desc: Magnesite is an oxide form of magnesium, one of the lightest Engineering metals on Earth. It's light weight and good toughness and machinability make it an ideal choice for starship hulls on Corvettes or Destroyers when speed is preferred to higher armor and hull integrity
name: Magnesite Hull

desc: Monotanium is a metallic alloy typically used in the armor plating of Hirogen warships and space stations. It also has the added effect of scattering targeting beams.
name: Monotanium Hull

desc: Tetraburnium is a metallic alloy capable of withstanding extreme amounts of heat and pressure.
name: Tetraburnium Hull

desc: Ablative armor is was originally designed as a primitive heat shielding for spacecraft. Over time it has been refined into an armor designed to disintegrate at a controlled rate under directed energy blasts, providing an additional layer of defense for starships.
name: Ablative Armor

desc: Wearing a powered exoskeleton suit augments the user's strength and speed. The military applications are obvious.
name: Powered Exo-Skeleton

desc: Without inertial dampers any sudden change in speed or heading could be catastrophic to the health of the crew. The new and improved dampers allow our starships to conduct operations at higher speeds and bank into harder turns than ever before.
name: Inertial Damper

desc: An advanced form of propulsion, avidyne impulse thrusters afford ships greater sublight speeds and maneuverability.
name: Avidyne Impulse

desc: These highly advanced fusion-powered thrusters provide ships with unmatched maneuverability and speed under sublight conditions.
name: Improved Impulse Manifold

desc: Improved plasma injection and mixing results in incresed speed when utilizing impulse power for maneuvering.
name: Hyper-Impulse Engine

desc: Starships can now be equipped with ramscoops, which are optimally positioned to collect interstellar particles. Collection works best in regions where particle density is high, such as in star systems or nebulae. The ranscoops collect hydrogen and deuterium which can be converted and used for fuel replenishment.
name: Ramscoop

desc: Similar to the old fusion warheads of yore, a Quantum torpedo uses a smaller Photon warhead to generate the energy required to fulfill its truly destructive potential. The smaller explosion forces a Calabi-Yau manifold to expand, which rapidly draws zero-points energy from space and then shortly implods, releasing a huge amount of energy. While slower to fire, quantum torpedoes are infinitely more powerful than their precursor.
name: Quantum Torpedo

desc: Extending, expanding and manipulating the Calabi-Yau manifold, the Quantum Torpedo can phase in and out of existence in the brief nano-seconds before the manifold collapses. This allows the Torpedo to pierce the armor and the hull of some ships and explode within, drastically increasing the potential damage.
name: Armor Penetrating Quantum Torpedo Specialization

desc: Using a bio-neural gel processor and Thoron shielding, the most powerful Quantum torpedo available becomes even more accurate, deadlier and harder to destroy in flight.
name: Shield Damage Quantum Torpedo Specialization
Rapid Fire Photon Torpedo Mk. XX Launcher

desc: Extending, expanding and manipulating the Calabi-Yau manifold, the Quantum Torpedo can phase in and out of existence in the brief nano-seconds before the manifold collapses to create weird intersecting geometries of space. This allows the Torpedo to cause drastic damage to the enemy ship's Shields.
name: Intersecting Geometries Quantum Torpedo

desc: Using a bio-neural gel processor and Thoron shielding, the most powerful Quantum torpedo available becomes even more accurate, deadlier and harder to destroy in flight.
name: Interlacing Fields Quantum Torpedo
Improved Rapid Fire Photon Torpedo Mk. XXV Launcher

desc: This new explosive is could be used as anything between a small anti-personnel explosive to weapons of mass destruction to destroy large installations such as space stations.
name: Tricobalt Explosives

desc: Our researchers have developed a new mine capable of replicating itself. Each mine has initially only 1/65 of the material stored in them for a single replacement mine. Replicators however transfer material to one another where it is needed in the field through networking. The neighbors of a detonated mine replace the lost mine in the end, material however comes from at least 65 different mines. As stored material begins to run out the mines have a zero-point extraction system for matter replenishment.
name: Self-Replicating Mines

desc: Recent developments in starship construction allows for far more robust and modular designs, with simplified production lines and scalable components that can fit a wide range of starships. Research and development centers can now plan for highly specialized ships that are best suited for the task at hand.
name: Advanced Starship design

desc: These electromagnetic projectile launchers use magnets to accelerate armor-piercing rounds towards targets at high speeds.
name: Mass Drivers

desc: Coilguns are more powerful versions of the early mass drivers, using electromagnetic coils to rapidly accelerate projectiles towards targets.
name: Coilguns

desc: The latest in electromagnetic accelerators, railguns use twin parallel rails to fire projectiles at incredible speeds.
name: Railguns

desc: A new version of the venerable railgun, with sturdier rails and an enhanced power supply. These weapons are even more powerful and accurate than their predecessors.
name: Advanced Railguns

desc: This updated version of the old coilgun design is even more destructive than the latest railgun designs. It is capable of launching projectiles with incredible accuracy and speed.
name: Gauss Cannons

desc: Very long-range artillery capable of hurling powerful rounds over extreme distances with a large degree of accuracy.
name: Kinetic Battery

desc: An even more powerful long-range, ship-based artillery cannon, equipped with a new barrel and an upgraded fire control computer.
name: Kinetic Artillery

desc: Large-caliber ballistic weapons that fire cased explosive shells. The main advantage of these cannons is their high rate of fire.
name: Autocannons

desc: These upgraded rotary autocannons feature improved tracking and fire control systems. This allows them to maintain an even higher rate of fire.
name: Ripper Cannons

desc: Advanced rotary autocannons capable of spewing a cloud of armor-piercing and high-explosive shells at a target.
name: Stormfire Cannons

desc: Gun batteries that fire area effect shrapnel rounds at close range. They are particularly lethal to enemy strike craft, but can also inflict damage on larger ships.
name: Flak Battery

desc: Upgraded flak batteries with new, more powerful shrapnel rounds. They offer excellent defense against both strike craft and missiles.
name: Flak Artillery

desc: Space-to-space missiles equipped with high-yield nuclear warheads. Although based on old pre-space technology, these crude fire-and-forget weapons can be surprisingly effective at range.
name: Nuclear Missiles

desc: These updated space-to-space missiles have more powerful fusion warheads and improved flight performance.
name: Fusion Missiles

desc: Advanced missiles equipped with very powerful antimatter warheads. A new and improved guidance system gives them a better chance of finding their targets.
name: Antimatter Missiles

desc: The latest version of space-to-space missile, this upgraded variant has an immensely powerful warhead that draws its energy from a zero point vacuum.
name: Quantum Missiles

desc: These highly advanced missiles are equipped with limited onboard AI pilots that substantially improve their performance and ability to track targets.
name: Marauder Missiles

desc: These smaller missiles are launched in volleys and have been specifically designed to overwhelm enemy point-defense systems.
name: Swarmer Missiles

desc: New miniaturization techniques will allow us to equip swarmer missiles with more powerful warheads and improved flight performance.
name: Whirlwind Missiles

desc: These torpedoes are essentially very large, slow-moving missiles. They are equipped with more powerful warheads and shield modulators that let them slip unmolested through energy screens.
name: Space Torpedoes

desc: Upgraded space torpedoes encased in armor, to better withstand enemy point-defense fire. The armor fragments into shards that cause additional damage when the torpedo detonates.
name: Armored Torpedoes

desc: Advanced torpedoes with very powerful warheads. They have a sleeker design, faster engines and upgraded shield modulators for slipping through energy screens.
name: Devastator Torpedoes

desc: The scientific method is a body of techniques for investigating phenomena, acquiring new knowledge, or correcting and integrating previous knowledge.
name: Scientific Method

desc: Storing information in specially-designed optical matrices, optical computers represent a significant advance in tactical simulation, increasing performance in many ways.
name: Optical Computers

desc: Complex heuristic algorithms developed through centuries of refinement, Virtual Intelligence aids greatly increase productivity by anticipating an user's needs.
name: Administrative Virtual Intelligence

desc: Duotronics, a form of 23rd century computer technology designed by the Federation Doctor Richard Daystrom, succeeded circuitry that used components such as resistors and transistors.
name: Duotronic Computers

desc: The pursuit of AI is one fraught with practical, computational and philosophical difficulties, including moral hazards. Cautious development is however necessary to further scientific understanding.
name: Basic AI

desc: Isolinear chips feature onboard nanoprocessors to aid in memory access and with a maximum capacity of 2.15 kiloquads. Though normally easily corrupted, chips can be coated with a layer of clear plastic for protection in environments more hostile than a computer core without affecting read and write capabilities; these strengthened chips are commonly used in tricorders, PADDs, and other handheld devices with isolinear chip drives.
name: Isolinear Computers

desc: Recent advances into Isolinear computer chips allow for remarkable breakthoughts in software development. Now, for the first time, AI research presents fresh conundrums as the system itself begins to contemplate it's own existence...
name: Self Aware AI

desc: The final stage of AI creation... how can we know what beings we will create when their capabilities will, by design, surpass our own?
name: Truly Sentient AI

desc: The Echo Papa 607 was an advanced weapon system developed by the arms dealers of Minos. Intended to be a complete weapon of war, the Echo Papa 607 was able to automatically send out small drones to gather intelligence, take prisoners, and mount attacks. The main advantage of the system was its progressive adaptability; each time a drone was destroyed, data on enemy equipment and tactics was returned to the parent system and a new drone was manufactured which improved on the previous model, countering the enemy's abilities.
name: Minos EP607 Weapon system

desc: High-capacity quantum bands dedicated to databank transfers make possible virtually completely synchronous research operations across vast distances.
name: Databank Uplink

desc: The Research Assistant provides every researcher with an assistant worthy of the name, freeing up more intellectual manpower to explore wider pursuits.
name: Virtual Research Assistant

desc: The M-5 computer utilizes very sophisticated technology based on next-level deep neural webs. This allows the computer to think and reason.
name: Multitronic M5 AI Experiment

desc: Miniaturization of the endpoint transmitters allow for installing them in clusters, further increasing bandwidth.
name: Improved Databank Uplink

desc: Aligning defensive and offensive weapon execution paradigms allows for increased efficiency.
name: Synchronized Defenses

desc: The development of distributed computer networks -- not merely across planets or star systems, but entire sectors.
name: Distributed Computing Network

desc: These devices consist of an artificial neural network, designed to imitate the humanoid brain. The construction of a positronic brain is extremely complex. One of the difficulties in creating a stable positronic brain is determining how the electron resistance across the neural filaments are to be resolved.
name: Positronic Brains

desc: An exocomp consists of a micro-replicator, a boridium power converter and axionic chip network. This axionic network gives the exocomp formidable computational power. The micro-replicator not only can create tools which the exocomp can use to solve problems but also creates new circuit pathways in the exocomp's memory when it performs new tasks. This mechanism gives the exocomp the ability to learn. The more tasks it has to perform, the more pathways ware formed in its memory.
name: Exo-Comps

desc: Organic circuitry, such as bio-neural gel packs, contained neural fibers surrounded in a blue gel with metallic interfaces on the top and bottom. They helped store more information and operated at faster speeds than isolinear circuitry.
name: Organic Circuitry

desc: Truly delving into the mysteries of the fundamental forces and subatomic particles.
name: Advanced Quantum Theory

desc: The seemingly erratic behavior of tiny things can dramatically alter the way we think about bigger things.
name: Applied Quantum Physics

desc: Three dimensions, inextricable from the fourth.
name: Space-Time Theory

desc: Manifestations of reality on multiple observable spectrums come into focus when seen as a single tapestry of interconnected physics!
name: Unified Field theory

desc: Transporters convert a person or object into an energy pattern, then beam it to a target, where it is reconverted into matter.
name: Transporters

desc: A replicator is a device that uses transporter technology to dematerialize quantities of matter and then rematerialize that matter in another form. It is also capable of inverting its function, thus disposing of leftovers and dishes and storing the bulk material again.
name: Replicators

desc: Application of Isolinear technologies in replicators had been prohibitive, but increases in the threshold of transmitter capacities has now enabled the use of AI to streamline the function and improve replication processes on an industrial scale.
name: Self-refining Assembly Algorithms

desc: A Holographic Environment Simulator, or holodeck for short, is a form of holotechnology. They can be installed aboard starships, space stations, and at other institutions for entertainment, training, and investigative purposes. A typical holodeck consists of a room equipped with a hologrid containing omnidirectional holographic diodes, enabling holographic projections and creation of holodeck matter through the manipulation of photons contained within force fields.
name: Holodeck

desc: Through latest advancements in holo technologies we are now able to project holographic particles into space. Finally breaking free of the restriction to holodecks.
name: Holographic Ship Projector

desc: Omicron radiation is an energy form which can only be created by certain forms of matter-antimatter reactions, and which can be toxic to certain forms of humanoid life. Extremely rare, omicron particles can be utilized in holography and to replenish antimatter reserves.
name: Omicron Radiation Manipulation

desc: Integrating holo technologies with an intergalactic economic algorithm has been lauded by Ferengi merchants as being a fulfillment of three of the 5 rules of acquisition, which has lead some to question of the ethical repercussions of having access to an intergalactic market. Despite this, the advent of the Holo Sale has create a stimulus in multiple transgalactic economies...
name: Holographic Salesperson

desc: The autonomous self-sustaining mobile holo-emitter, or mobile emitter, was a piece of technology designed to remotely power and enable a single holographic instance away from permanent holoemitters. Constructed of a poly-deutonic alloy unknown to 24th century science, the mobile emitter was approximately the size of a Human palm.
name: Mobile Hologram Emitter

desc: These sensors have been tuned to look for any gravitational changes in space, such as those produced by the presence of a starship.
name: Gravitic Sensors

desc: Sensors that detect the subspace fluctuations left in the wake of traveling starships. Their sensitivity and range is greater than that of a gravitic sensor array.
name: Subspace Differential Sensors

desc: Advanced sensors that rely on rotating tachyon beams to detect ship movements even at extreme distances.
name: Tachyon Detection Grid

desc: As our fleets roam every further from our ancestral home, our sensor technology continuously pushes past the limits of old.
name: Planetary Signal Boosters

desc: High energy plasma is confined in a toroidal electromagnetic field. New advancements in meta materials and breakthroughs in subspace-magnetohydrodynamics allow us to miniaturize this type of reactor design by decreasing the energy expenditure necessary to operate the reactor in a more stable and compressed high-confinement mode.
name: Miniaturized Tokamak reactor design

desc: This energy source generates power through induced fission, but it also produces harmful nuclear waste.
name: Fission Power

desc: Inertial electrostatic confinement is a branch of fusion research which uses an electric field to heat a plasma to fusion conditions. Electric fields can do work on charged particles (either ions or electrons), heating them to fusion conditions. This is typically done in a sphere, with material moving radially inward, but can also be done in a cylindrical or beam geometry. The electric field can be generated using a wire grid or a non-neutral plasma cloud.
name: Inertial Electrostatic Confinement

desc: A design that uses fast neutrons to sustain a fission reaction and consumes Pergium, a radioactive element rich in fissionable materials that produces less radio-toxic nuclear waste and doesn't require a neutron moderator. This type of reactor uses helium as coolant, material readily available near Class I type Gas Giants..
name: Advanced Fissionable Interactions

desc: The nuclear fusion reaction of three helium 4 nuclei produces a carbon. This Triple-alpha process relies on energy resonance state that has a small probability to occur and generates carbon and oxygen as byproduct, releasing energy in a high temperature plasma.
name: Carbon Reaction Fusion

desc: The Deuterium-Tritium fusion reaction releases more then four times the energy amount when compared to a Deuterium-Deuterium fusion, but to achieve fusion one must penetrate the coulomb barrier and the temperature requirements are much higher. Integrating a phase discriminator in the confinement beam to circumvent the coulomb barrier will allow the production of a safer, more powerful and efficient reactor.
name: Pure Deuterium/Tritium Reaction

desc: By cascading the phase discriminator field around an array of reactors, the energy requirements to maintain fusion can be lowered, thus increasing even more the efficiency and energy output.
name: Synchronous Fusion Injection

desc: Thermionic radiation is harmful to carbon-based life forms and thought to be impossible to be harnessed with a positive net worth. Recent advancements in deflector technology changed that paradigm.
name: Thermionic Reactions

desc: A Tetryon is a type of subatomic particle that originates from subspace. By extruding the particle field through different subspace manifolds in a controlled manner, it's possible to extract energy from the shallower subspace strata without the dangers of tetryonic radiation.
name: Tetryonic Power

desc: Through the use of specialized and improved plasma conduits, our cores can efficiently provide the Warp plasma needed to create vastly more stable subspace fields.
name: Gravimetric Field displacement manifold

desc: The primary source of power utilized in starships is provided by the enormous amount of output energy produced by a controlled matter-antimatter reaction. This reaction occurs within the intermix chamber of a warp core, and is contained by a magnetic containment field. This reaction produces a considerable amount of heat energy in addition to the kinetic energy that is used by the vessel's propulsion system. This heat is supplanted by a plasma coolant system that is situated adjacent to the intermix chamber. The loss of coolant would inevitably result in the overheating and destruction of the intermix chamber, causing a warp core breach.
name: Dilithium Crystal Circuit

desc: The basic mechanics of ship shields are complex, but they can be adjusted and improved in a multitude of ways. By changing the frequency and amplitude of the modulation the harmonics of the shield can be adjusted
name: Shield Harmonics
Aldean planetary atmospheric re-fracturing cloaking device

desc: Covariant deflector shielding use multiple interlacing force fields to create a truly resilient solution that are more durable than their counter-parts.
name: Covariant Shielding Specialization

desc: Regenerative Shields consist of a distributed network of shield emitters, allowing a rapid infusion of new energy to the shielding matrix.
name: Regenerative Shielding specialization

desc: Minor improvements to transmission efficiency adds up to a sizeable reduction in overall energy loss.
name: Applied Superconductivity

desc: Generated artificial gravity helps keep workers happy and healthy at their stations in space. Not only will their bodies not deteriorate as quickly due to unnatural environmental conditions but they will also be much more effective at their jobs than in a Zero-G environment.
name: Gravity Plating

desc: Capacitors capable of storing vast amounts of energy is one of the cornerstones for any modern civilization.
name: High-Energy Capacitors

desc: Perfecting the firing cadence of laser weaponry is a task that could keep the Engineering elite of any given planet busy for centuries.
name: Focusing Arrays

desc: New developments in tech cooling regularly surface, improving the stability and efficiency of our weapons systems, keeping them from blowing up the ships upon which they are mounted.
name: Flash Coolant

desc: Minor technical advances combine with improved shipboard routines for handling munitions to provide a noticeable boost in fire rate.
name: Loader Efficiency

desc: Advances in miniaturization allow for more rapid loading and discharging of torpedo payloads.
name: Miniaturized Pre-Igniters

desc: With the warhead explosive reaction tightly controlled by missile-board microprocessors, warhead detonations can be tuned for maximum effect for local conditions at the time of impact.
